issue.title: Document new API for service requests without input

content.raw:
1. I can install an ignition library using ```sudo apt-get install libignition-transport-dev``` or 
from sources. These two cases are suggested in [Installation Section](http://ignition-transport.readthedocs.io/en/default/installation/installation.html). Could you explain me what library's version is used if I install using ```apt-get ```? How can I check it? Will I have new functionality for request without input in this case?
content.html: 1. I can install an ignition library using sudo apt-get install libignition-transport-dev or from sources. These two cases are suggested in Installation Section.
